text: David Bustamante Hoyos (born 25 March 1982) is a Spanish pop singer- songwriter. He gained fame in 2001 as a third-place winner on Operaci√≥n Triunfo. Bustamante has sold more than 2 million records in Spain and Latin America, getting 15 Platinum in albums. ==Other websites== *David Bustamante - Official Website Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish singer-songwriters Category:Spanish pop singers
